連れる: to take (someone) with one, to bring along, to go with
捕まえる: to catch, to capture, to arrest
旦那: master (of a house, shop, etc.), husband, sir
湧く: to well (up), to gush out (of water), to spring out
衿芯: collar core (stiff fabric, etc. inside a collar)
漂う: to drift, to float, to waft (e.g. a scent)
寄坐: child or doll used as a vessel for a spirit invoked by a shaman or miko
紫微垣: Purple Forbidden Enclosure (group of constellations in the northern sky associated with the emperor)
触れる: to touch, to feel, to touch (with)
企てる: to plan, to plot, to propose
